```pddl
[
  '(:action attempt ; Attempt an action on a target with a weapon
    :parameters (?actor - player ?target - player ?weapon - weapon ?loc1 - location ?loc2 - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?actor ?loc1) (at ?target ?loc2) (has_weapon ?actor ?weapon) (not (headshot ?actor ?target ?weapon)))
    :effect (headshot ?actor ?target ?weapon)
  )',
  
  '(:action shotgun_shot ; Perform a shotgun shot, either at another player or oneself
    :parameters (?p1 - player ?p2 - player ?loc1 - location ?loc2 - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?p1 ?loc1) (has_weapon ?p1 shotgun) (at ?p2 ?loc2))
    :effect (attempt_headshot ?p1 ?p2 shotgun)
  )',
  
  '(:action pistol ; Use the pistol in a player interaction
    :parameters (?p1 - player ?p2 - player ?loc1 - location ?loc2 - location ?weapon - weapon)
    :precondition (and (at ?p1 ?loc1) (at ?p2 ?loc2) (has_weapon ?p1 ?weapon) (not (attempted ?p1 ?p2 ?weapon)))
    :effect (attempted ?p1 ?p2 ?weapon)
  )',
  
  '(:action boomshot ; Perform a critical shot with a weapon, updating the shot status
    :parameters (?w - weapon ?p - player ?target - player ?loc - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (has_weapon ?p ?w) (not (shot ?p ?target ?w)))
    :effect (shot ?p ?target ?w)
  )',
  
  '(:action sniper ; Perform a sniper action, targeting an entity with a specified weapon
    :parameters (?shooter - player ?target - player ?weapon - weapon ?loc1 - location ?loc2 - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?shooter ?loc1) (at ?target ?loc2) (has_weapon ?shooter ?weapon) (not (neutralized ?target)))
    :effect (and (attempt_headshot ?shooter ?target ?weapon) (neutralized ?target))
  )'
]
```
